evidence:
Found 6 exploits for "dnsmasq 2.75":
- Dnsmasq < 2.78 - 2-byte Heap Overflow [CVE-2017-14491]
- Dnsmasq < 2.78 - Heap Overflow [CVE-2017-14492]
- Dnsmasq < 2.78 - Information Leak [CVE-2017-14494]
- Dnsmasq < 2.78 - Integer Underflow [CVE-2017-14496]
- Dnsmasq < 2.78 - Lack of free() Denial of Service [CVE-2017-14495]
- Dnsmasq < 2.78 - Stack Overflow [CVE-2017-14493]
remediation: Update dnsmasq to the latest version.

evidence:
Found 2 exploits for "Samba 3.X":
- Samba < 3.0.20 - Remote Heap Overflow [EDB-ID]
- Samba < 3.6.2 (x86) - Denial of Service (PoC) [CVE-2015-0240]
remediation: Update Samba smbd to the latest version.

evidence:

- MySQL < 5.6.35 / < 5.7.17 - Integer Overflow [CVE-2017-3599]
- MySQL < 5.6.35 / < 5.7.17 - Integer Overflow [CVE-2017-3599]
remediation: Update MySQL to the latest version.
